categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Darth Caba was a Sith Lord who served the Sith Empire during the Great Galactic War. In about 3653 BBY, Caba gathered a number of intelligence reports that suggested that a Serenno-based noble, an ally of Jedi Master Ven Zallow, was in fact secretly an agent of the Sith Empire.

Darth Caba was mentioned in Book of Sith: Secrets from the Dark Side, a 2012 publication that was written by Daniel Wallace. Caba was originally set to appear in the online game Star Wars: The Old Republic, as the Head of Intelligence of the Sith Empire, and Wallace mentioned him in Book of Sith as a reference to some background material from The Old Republic that he had received. However, Caba did not make it into the final version of the game.
